table.name: vtiger_movings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_movings` ( `movingsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `movingsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `date_flight` date DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`movingsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_movingscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_movingscf` ( `movingsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`movingsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
